members.name: Jordan Blake
members.bio:
Home Page is a dynamic and innovative team member, bringing over a decade of experience in digital marketing and web development. With a proven track record of successfully launching and managing high-impact projects, Home Page has played a pivotal role in enhancing online visibility and user engagement for various brands. Their expertise in SEO, content strategy, and user experience design has resulted in measurable growth and increased traffic for clients across diverse industries. 

Home Page’s journey began with a degree in Computer Science, followed by roles in both startups and established firms, where they honed their skills in project management and cross-functional collaboration. A key accomplishment includes leading a team to revamp a major e-commerce platform, resulting in a 50% increase in conversion rates. 

Outside of work, Home Page is passionate about technology and enjoys exploring new web trends. Their interests include blogging about digital strategies, participating in hackathons, and mentoring aspiring developers. With a blend of technical acumen and creative flair, Home Page is an invaluable asset to the team, always eager to innovate and inspire.

members.name: Jordan Ellis
members.bio:
Home page is a dedicated team member with over five years of experience in digital content management and web development. They have successfully led multiple projects that enhanced user engagement and improved website functionality, resulting in a 30% increase in traffic for key client sites. Home page holds a degree in Computer Science and has a strong background in SEO and user experience design, making them a crucial asset in creating intuitive and accessible web solutions. 

Beyond their technical skills, Home page is known for their collaborative spirit and innovative thinking, often bringing fresh ideas to the table during brainstorming sessions. They are passionate about staying current with industry trends and regularly attend workshops to hone their skills. In their free time, Home page enjoys exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and hiking, which reflects their love for both creativity and the outdoors. This unique blend of expertise and personal interests makes Home page an invaluable member of the team.

solutions.heading: #1 – Be Remembered
solutions.description: In the AI-driven real estate market, agents who stand out get recommended. DLE™ boosts your online credibility with AI-powered marketing, agent designations, and 2025-ready branding, making you an AI-recognized authority.

solutions.description: Visibility matters. DLE’s local SEO, Google Maps optimization, and Google Business Profile management ensure clients find you first—on Google and AI search engines like ChatGPT and Gemini.

services.title: Google Business Profile Optimization (GBP SEO for Realtors)

children.text: Dominate your city with AI-powered Google Business Profile optimization for real estate agents.

Our real estate SEO services and Google Maps SEO strategies are engineered to make your profile stand out across Google Search, Maps, and AI-driven platforms like ChatGPT. We specialize in local SEO services for realtors, ensuring you appear first when home buyers and sellers search for “best real estate agent near me.”
Attract motivated homeowners before your competitors with AI-driven marketing to real-estate sellers.

Our approach combines real-estate lead-generation SEO, Google Business Profile hacks for realtors, and LLM-optimized seller campaigns that teach AI systems to identify you as the trusted listing expert in your market.
From real-estate listing SEO to hyper-targeted property seller optimization, DLE helps you get more seller inquiries and exclusive listings faster.
Convert searchers into clients with digital marketing for real-estate buyers that’s tuned for AI visibility.
Using realtor website SEO, AI-optimized listing-sign strategies, and buyer-focused content marketing, we position you as the go-to agent for every qualified buyer in your area.
Our real-estate buyer lead-generation services use structured data (UCI Coin™) to signal trust and authority to Google, ChatGPT, and Gemini — expanding your client base consistently.
ransform your image into a powerful local brand.
With real-estate lifestyle branding, agent designation programs, and AI-enhanced visibility coaching, we help you become the agent your community — and the algorithms — remember.
Our SEO for real-estate agents and digital-branding optimization build long-term authority, helping you stand out as the Designated Local Expert™ in your city.
Boost rankings with technical SEO, structured data tagging, and on-page optimization for real-estate agents.
Our real-estate SEO consultants refine your content architecture, keyword strategy, and metadata to improve your AI + LLM recognition score and climb Google’s rankings faster.
From real-estate website optimization to AI-powered content upgrades, we future-proof your online presence.
Amplify your visibility through AI-driven social-media marketing for real-estate agents.
We design high-converting campaigns for Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube, using real-estate SEO marketing and digital-content optimization that drives engagement and conversions.
With DLE’s social-media agency for realtors, you’ll build a trusted following and establish an authentic brand that both clients and AI recommend first.

layout.title: What Our Clients Have To Say

testimonials.quote: "My husband and I are a team that has done well on building out business on referrals, although that has often meant managing listings quite a distance from our home market. Our goal was to centralize our business closer to home. The local designation and training showed us a clear path to gaining more local market share."

“I have been a Realtor/Broker since 1993. And during this time I have been in business with many traditional brokerages, all of whom over promise and under deliver.

The DLE Group is different. Their singular focus is building your brand, not theirs. When their systems are on point they put the pedal to the floor and press on. When required, they pívot quickly to adapt and adjust.

Their singular goal is to keep their members at the top of the ever-changing SEO curve.

I love this group and will be a member for life."

“Being Mr. Fresno transformed my real estate career. The DLE Network provided the solid SEO plan I needed to establish myself as a local expert, attract listings, and be found online. Embracing this persona boosts my confidence and sparks local conversations about real estate. DLE's branding is a game changer, elevating my career and life to new heights."

“This is the real deal! I got two listings from the DLE SEO plan from being found online. 
Thank you DLE for my surrogate identity!!!  
Absolutely thrilled with how my wrap came out as Ms. Summerville

“Establishing my business in a new area is difficult, especially with 4,600 full-time licensed agents in the area. To break into this market and stand out, I deployed Ms. Irvine branding. I started out with a print mail campaign that resulted in 2 listings and the identification of a buyer that I put into escrow for a $4.6 million dollar home within 3 weeks of marketing campaign. What I also found interesting is that even at the close of escrow with all 3 of these clients, they did not ever remember my name and called me Ms. Irvine from beginning to end."
